name: create-query
description: Creates new query from a data source. You must use `get-query-sources` tool to list available data sources and pick one from the list. This tool does not have any side effects and outputs a new query serialized as JSON. To make subsequent changes to the query, use `change-query` tool. To run the query use `run-query` tool.

source.description: Query data source. Use must use `get-query-sources` tool to get a list of available data sources and pick one from the list.
